name: accessibility-widget-dependencies
description: Required dependencies for the React Native Accessibility Widget

installation.npm: npm install react-native-gesture-handler react-native-safe-area-context @react-native-async-storage/async-storage expo-speech react-native-vector-icons
installation.yarn: yarn add react-native-gesture-handler react-native-safe-area-context @react-native-async-storage/async-storage expo-speech react-native-vector-icons

additional_setup: Ensure TTS engine is available on device

font_size_control.description: Adjust text size (normal, large, very large)
font_size_control.accessibility: Improves readability for users with visual impairments

high_contrast_mode.description: Toggle between normal and high contrast color schemes
high_contrast_mode.accessibility: Helps users with low vision or color blindness

line_height_control.description: Adjust spacing between lines of text

text_to_speech.description: Read content aloud using device TTS
text_to_speech.accessibility: Assists users with reading difficulties or visual impairments
